name: Clear Car Rental
overview:
Clear Car Rental Pvt. Ltd. is a true, service based online car booking portal delivering required car rental services in 210+ cities within India, always at the scheduled time. We have an experienced team of having in-depth information about car rental operations , In addition, our team is capable of handling Car rental related problems, be it for the bookings you have made or for any specific transport related issue. We attend your queries with great personal care.

Now, Clear Car Rental has carved a niche in the field of Online Car Booking service by gaining wide range of customers across more than 210+ cities in India. We are happy to receive a warm acceptance from all range of customers starting from an ordinary travel enthusiast to a global corporate traveler. In turn, it is our duty to make our customers more comfortable by enhancing our potentials. Keeping this in mind, CCR has launched its Beta version that is more attractive, elegant and user friendly.

You would notice the change in the outlook as we have incorporated additional features in the Services section. We provide both local and outstation travel solutions, in the local you would get packages for full day and half day. And, in the outstation section you would get packages for round trip, one way drop and multi city travels.
